channel.title: Cli on Adam's Blag
channel.description: Recent content in Cli on Adam's Blag

item.title: Building a Cli Tool in Rust
item.description: Like almost everyone I know, I’ve been sitting pacing inside for almost 8 weeks, waiting out the sars-cov-2 pandemic. I’ve been “zooming” with friends, phoning my family members, and catching up on reading. Gone are the days of concerts and movie theaters. Now is the time for reading, Animal Crossing, and updating one’s websites. So here it is, a new theme for a new year and a new post to help stave off boredom.
